message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?  It's a steal for something you value at $10,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price. Can we meet at $8,500?
